huangqi.name: Astragalus
huangqi.description: Astragalus is a herb used to enhance immunity, with benefits including qi tonification, yang elevation, defensive qi strengthening, water retention reduction, fluid generation, blood nourishment, qi and blood circulation promotion, toxin expulsion, and wound healing.

lingzhi.name: Lingzhi
lingzhi.description: Lingzhi is a precious Chinese herb known for its benefits in qi tonification, mind calming, heart and lung nourishment, and longevity promotion. Modern research shows it enhances immunity, has anti-tumor properties, and protects the liver.
benefits: Tonifies qi and calms the mind

jianghuang.name: Curcumin
jianghuang.description: Curcumin, extracted from turmeric, possesses powerful anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties. Research indicates it can help relieve arthritis, improve cognitive function, and prevent cardiovascular diseases.

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.description: Difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep

anxiety.name: Anxiety
anxiety.description: Persistent state of tension and worry
